CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing International Terminals relative to Ferry Services?
SRP.A: International Terminals is {above} Ferry Services in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing High-Speed Trains relative to International Terminals?
SRP.A: High-Speed Trains is {below} International Terminals in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Shared Ride relative to High-Speed Trains?
SRP.A: Shared Ride is {below} High-Speed Trains in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total luggage loss rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Shared Ride}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total luggage loss rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ferry Services}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ferry Services's maximum Luggage Loss Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ferry Services's maximum Luggage Loss Rate is in {1959}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is High-Speed Trains's maximum Luggage Loss Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: High-Speed Trains's maximum Luggage Loss Rate is in {1985}.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1979, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 1961 and 1969?
NC.A: The average total luggage loss rate between 1963 and 1979 was {higher} than between 1961 and 1969.

NC.Q: Was the total Luggage Loss Rate in 1960 higher or lower than in 1969?
NC.A: The total luggage loss rate in 1960 was {lower} than in 1969.

NC.Q: Was the total Luggage Loss Rate in 1964 higher or lower than in 1970?
NC.A: The total luggage loss rate in 1964 was {lower} than in 1970.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1975, was the average total Luggage Loss Rate higher or lower than between 1959 and 1970?
NC.A: The average total luggage loss rate between 1964 and 1975 was {higher} than between 1959 and 1970.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Shared Ride} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did International Terminals and High-Speed Trains first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: International Terminals and High-Speed Trains first exchanged leading positions in {1963}.
